summary: Identified 7 plan weaknesses. Key findings: (1) Plan contradicts itself on Choice A vs B; (2) Truth lemma statement change from fam.mcs 0 to fam.mcs t is underspecified; (3) SoundnessLemmas.lean has 35+ theorems, not 10; (4) Phase dependencies misordered; (5) Using Set.univ for validity definitions dramatically simplifies soundness; (6) canonicalOmega does NOT need shift-closure (shift-closure only needed at validity level where Set.univ is trivially shift-closed); (7) The Box forward proof fails with shift-closed Omega but works perfectly with unshifted canonical histories.

artifacts.summary: Plan review identifying 7 weaknesses with actionable recommendations: use Set.univ for validity, define canonicalOmega without shift-closure, reorder phases, and commit to Choice B with construct_saturated_bmcs_int
